h1. Usage report

<div ng-controller="UsageController">
	<!-- {[usagereport]} -->
	<div ng-repeat="report in usagereport">

		<br />

		<br />
		fromTime:: {[ report.fromTime | date:'dd/MM/yyyy h:mma' ]}
		<br />
		lastupdatedTime: {[report.lastupdatedTime]}
		<hr />
		<div ng-repeat="cloudspace in report.cloudspaces">

					deletiontime: {[machine.deletiontime]}
					cost: {[machine.cost]}
				<hr />
				{[machine.deletiontime]}
				</div>
			</div>
		</div>
